sentences.en: A new fuzzy dynamic assessment based on mutation theory is proposed.
sentences.cn: 笔者提出了基于突变理论的模糊动态评价方法.

sentences.en: Analyzes the factors that influence the stretching changing in the hoisting process and put forward a method that adopting S-curve could reduce the stretching mutation.
sentences.cn: 分析了提升过程中钢丝绳张力变化的影响因素，提出了采用S曲线速度图是可以减小张力突变的一种方法。

sentences.en: ConclusionG 71 R gene mutation combined with G 6 PDdeficiency aggravates the degree of neonatal jaundice.
sentences.cn: 结论G6PD缺乏与G71R基因突变并存加重新生儿黄疸程度.

sentences.en: For example, it is hard to say whether an ART baby has died because of the ART technology or because one of its parents had a mutation that mutually contributed to subpar fertility and infant death.
sentences.cn: 例如，很难说是否一个ART的宝宝会因为ART技术而死亡，或者他父母中的其中一个出现突变，这对于在平均水平以下的受精和婴儿的死亡是互相贡献的。

sentences.en: Genetics: Color mutation - The Hypo Boa is a Co - dominant or incomplete dominant trait.
sentences.cn: 遗传学: 彩色突变 - 该次宝儿是共同主导的或不完整的主要特征.

sentences.en: In non - coding region It'shows mutation of single nucleotide deletion or substitution.
sentences.cn: 非编码区亦存在单个碱基缺失及置换突变.

sentences.en: Mutation are produced by a number of chemicals.
sentences.cn: 许多化学试剂能产生突变.

sentences.en: Mutation of ENG gene can cause type 1 hereditary hemorrhagic telangiectasia ( HHT 1 ) .
sentences.cn: 由ENG基因突变所引起的HHT称为 HHT1.

sentences.en: People who have this mutation need less sleep than others.
sentences.cn: 有这种突变的人需要的睡眠比其他人少.

sentences.en: Ras gene mutation in childhood AML was mainly found in M 2 , M 4 , M 5 subtypes.
sentences.cn: AML患儿中ras基因突变多见于M2 、 M4及M5型.

sentences.en: Scientists have found a genetic mutation that appears to be the cause of Huntington's disease.
sentences.cn: 科学家们已经发现了一种可能是引起亨廷顿舞蹈病的基因变异。

sentences.en: So far the discussion has centered entirely around mutation in the strict sense.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止,严格来讲,讨论完全集中于围绕突变问题上.

sentences.en: So that is very important , the mutation is very important.
sentences.cn: 总而言之, 病毒变异的研究是很重要的.

sentences.en: Spontaneous and induced mutation occur with animals viruses.
sentences.cn: 动物病毒的突变有自发突变和诱发突变.

sentences.en: The more people who have the virus, the more virus particles there are for that one, fatal mutation to appear in.
sentences.cn: 因为如果有越多人感染到病毒，就有越多病毒颗粒可以酝酿出一种致命的突变病毒品种。

sentences.en: The mutation was confirmed by allele specific PCR ( ASPCR ).
sentences.cn: 应用等位基因特异性 PCR 验证测序所发现的突变.

sentences.en: This mutation makes it better adapted than the other four.
sentences.cn: 这种变异使它具有比其他四只猪为大的适应能力.

words.tran_cn: 易变性；性情不定；突变性
诱导有机体突变的物质

phrases.tran_cn: 突变率；变异概率；突变速率

trans.tran_en: a change in the  genetic  structure of an animal or plant that makes it different from others of the same kind
